Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Keeps track of money and items owned by the crew
    Author:
    Cameron Stevenson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • consume

        public InventoryItem consume(java.lang.String itemName,
                             int quantity)
                      throws ItemNotFoundException,
                             InsufficientQuantityException,
                             NotConsumableException
        Remove some quantity of some item from the inventory
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item
        quantity - The quantity to be consumed
        Returns:
        The item consumed
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if item was not found in the inventory
        InsufficientQuantityException - if the inventory does not have enough of the item
        NotConsumableException - if the item is not consumable
